title: In-game lag for some games, but not all
body: It started about two weeks ago, when I spawn in I notice that I have got latency. As the game goes on, it gets worse, animations stop, minion kills are late, abilities are late and I am forced to restart my game, which not long ago caused me to lose a game, that is why I am writing now. It needs to stop. If I restart my game it stops. I have never had any fps lag ever, I am running on full graphics and my internet is fine, I never really experience lag.

replies.body: Lagging sometimes can be caused by packet loss, and when unstable, could happen randomly or unexpectedly.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for this case to get an analysis along with some troubleshooting steps.  Let me know what you find!

I have just realised I posted in NA while I am at EUW.. Regardless, I am very sure that it has nothing to do with packet loss. I play with my brother, and we both experienced it several times, however, never at the same time. Restarting the game works for both of us.
(edit) I will give the log reader a try
